item.description:
This is a last minute, EXCLUSIVE meetup for the Red Sox Natives!

We have been contacted by the Red Sox Foundation to provide some last minute support for a charitable event later today.

TONIGHT! From every member who gives us a YES RSVP, we will select 12 members to attend private fundraiser event at the private home home Curt and Shonda Shilling in support of the CD release of Jason Veritek's first studio album "I'm Catchy"

7pm - Cocktails, sandwiches & meet and greet with 50 attendees
8pm - Private acoustic performance by Jason
There will be a silent auction for several items, including a signed copy of his CD and a date with Jason.

RSVP NOW - 'Drawing' will be later this afternoon and you will be notified by 3pm if you are randomly selected.

Good luck and represent us well!
item.name: Meet Captain Jason Veritek! TONIGHT!!
